entry.title: Take Your Children To Work Day
entry.summary:
Author: EJ_Rambles

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,329Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 19

Summary: Bruce was so bored. That seemed to be the norm for a Justice League meeting.It wasn’t his first time visiting the team, after Clark introduced them he tagged along to some of the meetings as an almost member.He enjoyed listening to the happenings of each of the heroes…however…there wasn’t much going on recently and it was a whole lot of filler.So the whispering in his ears was even more distracting than normal.-------Or;Cryptid Batfam crash a JL meeting and meet various heroes and sidekicks!
